text_block_list.text:
On a day off, I happened to run into Ines Fujin while walking 
around town. Unusual, as she spends most of her free time 
at her part time jobs.
choice_data_list: No shift today I see.
No shift today I see.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer! Yep, a rare occasion～♪

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
So I'm taking the opportunity to go all around town 
and enjoy it to the fullest! Now where do I start～?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… Well, I would've liked to, at least.
choice_data_list: What's up?
What's up?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
The thing is… Killing a little time is easy enough, but 
I have no clue how to deal with a whole day……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Yeah… it's surprisingly hard～!
Considering how active she always is, that's such a her problem to have I'm not even surprised. In that case —
choice_data_list: Shall I escort you today?
Shall I escort you today?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Oh? You, Trainer?
choice_data_list: I owe you for all your help as well.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I see, I see～ 
In that case, I'll take you up on that!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Where are you gonna lead me～? 
Ehehe♪ I'm expecting a wonderful time!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Wohaaoh～! Those cranes and koalas are so cute～♪

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You can't find all these animals at the local zoo! 
My little sisters will be so amazed when I tell them!

Seeing her smile and wanting to keep up how well 
this was going, I tried to cross-reference the spots 
recommended on social media with the map, but…
choice_data_list: The petting area is… uhh? I don't see it.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? Gimme a minute. 
…… Let's see～

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
They moved last week apparently. 
Says it's opposite the Penguin Corner now!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Amazing! This view's spectacular～! 
You think we can see the academy through this telescope～?
choice_data_list: Let's take a peek!

text_block_list.text:
Putting words right into action, I tried to 
insert a coin in the telescope before her.
choice_data_list: Wait, I don't have any change!?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Awww～ I think I saw an exchange section back there if……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Hey—! Man, you're panicking too much! There's no need 
to rush, the telescope's not going anywhere, you know～?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
The atmosphere here feels kind of really mature… 
…… It's a little exciting♪
choice_data_list: Got my change already, it's time to play!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Ahh! Wait, wait, wait! 
There's a sign over there!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
It says you need special coins to play here. 
You need to exchange some first, Trainer!

We continued to drop by various places, but everywhere 
we went I ended up needing Ines Fujin to help me out.
choice_data_list: Ugh, my self-image……
Ugh, my self-image……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Don't let it get you down! Cheer up! 
Though I can't deny you had a few fumbles.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I got to go to so many unfamiliar places and I can tell 
you put a lot of effort into everything.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I'm… feeling really happy!

Ines Fujin will follow my lead and back me up. 
Still, as her trainer, I want to actually be of use to her.

Somewhere I can "be of use to her" ― 
Come to think of it, there's one place we haven't been yet.

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Wooooaaaahhhh……!!!)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Oh man, oh man! 
That girl hasn't slowed down this whole time!

I watched a heated race unfold with Ines Fujin. 
Her eyes were glued to the leading horse girl who 
was gallantly running away from the rest.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Turf, 2400m…… She ran an escape on 
the same distance as the Japan Derby!

Turf, 2400m. As she says, it's the distance 
of the Japan Derby. It was also the same distance 
as that time she stole my heart in an instant.
choice_data_list: You can run just as well, no, better!
You can run just as well, no, better!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You think? 
…… No, I want that to be true!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
This made me realise once again. 
I… really love running an escape!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I want to constantly run as fast as I can, faster than 
anyone else, like a wind sweeping the turf!
There it is. Her passionate gaze — the beast inside surfacing.

When her wish comes true, I'm sure the entire audience will be 
captivated by her. I couldn't help but picture the scene at the 
venue, the unending cheers for her performance.
choice_data_list: Then we aim for the lead early!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
That's right! The groundwork for 
an escape is laid early after all!
choice_data_list: We'll need to focus on your starts too.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, there was a girl in this race who reacted late and couldn't 
break away from the pack… I better concentrate, too!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I could also be blocked or run out stamina in the final leg…
choice_data_list: You'll need power and stamina for that.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Mm-hm!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
(Trainer's opening up more than earlier now. 
Looking happy, giving it their all. It's kind of……)

I became naturally impassioned by the conversation 
and before I knew it, quite a bit of time had passed.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
What can I say…… 
You really are a trainer.
choice_data_list: S-Sorry for rambling on……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I didn't mean that in a bad way! I can tell that you really want 
me to win. Those honest feelings reached me loud and clear.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… I thought you were pretty dashing even!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: So don't apologize, mm?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for today! If we get another chance, 
let's go out somewhere together again!
choice_data_list: I'll escort you properly next time!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Mm, I'm looking forward to it♪
I was able to spend a fulfilling day off with Ines Fujin.
